channel.title: =====-------Help Pl0x-------=====
channel.description: I know I'm a noob, but I've been looking for a long time now and I'm tired of it. How do I change Team Capes in the Skill Cape Shop(Bob) to show [b]ACTUAL[/b] Skill Capes? It says the skill capes name and all that [s]shit[/s] but idfk how to change what it looks like. Sorry for my language, but this is really aggravating. [b]Any and all help[/b] is appreciated! - David

item.title: =====-------Help Pl0x-------=====
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

I know I’m a noob, but I’ve been looking for a long time now and I’m tired of it. How do I change Team Capes in the Skill Cape Shop(Bob) to show ACTUAL Skill Capes? It says the skill capes name and all that shit but idfk how to change what it looks like. Sorry for my language, but this is really aggravating. Any and all help is appreciated!

  • David
